content: here s a fun and easy rainbow crochet blanket pattern you can make it as a crochet baby blanket or a regular-size crochet blanket it is completely reversible and customizable you can use any colors and make it in any size plus it includes a video tutorial about the pattern - the blanket has ripples at the start and end of the blanket with a simple middle section in between - the pattern creates a blanket that is soft warm and cozy - you can use any size 4 medium yarn and customize the colors - the finished blanket is approx 29 wide and 43 high which is a great size for a small crib blanket - you can easily adjust the size instructions are included in the pattern
